mapper.select: select GOODS_NO,GOODS_NAME,GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_DETAIL,GOODS_THUMBNAIL,GOODS_DATE, GOODS_ONOFF,GOODS_COUNT,GOODS_KCAL, GOODS_TYPE,GOODS_AMOUNT, nvl(WISH_GOODS_NO,0) as wish_no from SG_GOODS LEFT OUTER JOIN SG_WISH ON GOODS_NO = WISH_GOODS_NO AND WISH_MEMBER_NO =#{MEMBER_NO} where GOODS_ONOFF = 0
SELECT IMAGE_IMAGE FROM SG_IMAGE where IMAGE_GOODS_NO = #{GOODS_NO}
select * from SG_COMMENT where COMMENT_GOODS_NO= #{GOODS_NO} ORDER BY COMMENT_REGDATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into SG_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_ID, COMMENT_GOODS_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_RATE, COMMENT_REGDATE) values (SG_COMMENT_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{COMMENT_ID}, #{COMMENT_GOODS_NO}, #{COMMENT_CONTENT}, #{COMMENT_RATE}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT GOODS_NO,GOODS_NAME,GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_DETAIL,GOODS_THUMBNAIL,GOODS_DATE, GOODS_ONOFF,GOODS_COUNT,GOODS_KCAL, GOODS_TYPE,GOODS_AMOUNT, nvl(WISH_GOODS_NO,0) as wish_no FROM SG_GOODS LEFT OUTER JOIN SG_WISH ON GOODS_NO = WISH_GOODS_NO AND WISH_MEMBER_NO =#{MEMBER_NO} WHERE GOODS_ONOFF=0 and GOODS_TYPE = #{GOODS_TYPE}
